ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISPICKVAL( Status, 'Awaiting Feedback') && (ISBLANK(TEXT(Carrier_To_Customer__c)) || ISBLANK( Transport_Date__c ) || ISBLANK( Transport_Document_Number__c ) || ISBLANK( Customer_Delivery_Date_Received__c ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Carrier To Customer, Transportation Date, Transportation Document Number and Customer Delivery Date Received is required
